text:
please discuss 
with your midwife. If your iron 
levels have not improved on 
retesting (after 4 weeks), you 
may need to have other blood 
tests	to	find	the	cause	of	your	
anaemia. How can I get more 
iron in my diet?
The main dietary sources of 
iron are: 
• red meat such as lamb, 
beef or pork;
• fish	and	poultry.
Aim to include at least one 
portion of these every day. (Do 
not eat more than two portions 
of	oily	fish	per	week.)
Non-meat sources of iron 
include:
• fortified	breakfast	cereal
